Articles.Content:
Hello, I am quite new here and it is the first forum which I have been using.

I caught this game on a youtube channel under the name Robbaz, and the instant I saw the game my wildest dreams had been answered. This game was literally JUST what I had always wanted, and is filled with people like me. I can tell its going to be great here :-* . WOO!

This is madspy, signing out.

* TRANSMISSION ENDED*

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Welcome to the community!
